reviewText: The movie Ben Hur is the best, it was better than the new version that was made recently. something's are better left alone and the classics cannot tampered with because the old actors put their soul, spirit and heart in what they were doing. The ten commandments will never die, it is played on TV once a year. The memory of the just is blessed: but the name of the wicked shall rot - Proverbs 10:7. Charlton Heston  was awesome.
Great old movie.  DVD looked new, ran flawlessly.
What can I say other than this is one of my all time favorite movies and must have in my DVD collection.

I am impressed with the price of the items and the expedience in which they were delivered.  Thank you so much.

Frances P
What's not to like?  They're classics!  Arrived quickly and quality DVDs.
